original_title: Delayed Government Analyst’s reports to be issued soon
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Minister of Justice, Prisons Affairs and Constitutional Reforms Dr. Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe PC said the delayed reports of the Department of Government Analyst will be provided within six months.
He said the delay was due to difficulties in importing the chemicals needed for the tests, as a result of the coronavirus pandemic and the economic crisis.
The Minister said it costs around Rs.20,000 to conduct a test, as prices of the chemical rose sharply following the pandemic.
Minister Rajapakshe said a programme is in place to complete the delayed tests within the next six months, and tests will be completed within the relevant month thereafter.
